data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Apsilops Förster (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Cryptinae) from Japan, parasitoid of an aquatic crambid moth

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yoshida, Takuma, Nagasaki, Osamu, Hirayama, Tomoko (2011): A new species of the genus Apsilops Förster (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Cryptinae) from Japan, parasitoid of an aquatic crambid moth. Zootaxa 2916: 41-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206662
